project.name: Open Sound Control Routable Input Java Example
project.description: An Open Sound Control example which uses an analog message to determine the frequency.

property.name: space.activity.osc.server.host
property.description: The host which contains the OSC server which is being controlled by this activity.

property.name: space.activity.osc.server.port
property.description: The port the OSC server which is being controlled by this activity is listening on.

property.name: osc.signal.multiplier
property.description: The values from the analog signal will be multiplied by this value before being sent over the OSC channel.

property.name: osc.frequency.base
property.description: This value will be added post multiplication by the signal multiplier before being sent over the OSC channel.

property.name: analog.max
property.description: The maximum value we expect the analog signal to reach. The signal will be divided by this value before starting the OSC calculations.
